trigger.name: AntMiner S9 Hashrate information not available on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Temp6.last(#3)}>90 or {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Temp7.last(#3)}>90 or {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Temp8.last(#3)}>90) and {AntMiner S9:icmpping.last()}=1
trigger.recovery_expression: ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Temp6.last()}<90 or {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Temp7.last()}<90 or {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Temp8.last()}<90) and {AntMiner S9:icmpping.last()}=1
trigger.name: AntMiner S9 High temp on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: (({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.WorkingMode.last()} = 240 and ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Hashrate.max(240)}<10 and {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Elapsed.last()}>600)) or ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Hashrate.max(240)}<13 and {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Elapsed.last()}>600)) and ({AntMiner S9:icmpping.last()}=1)
trigger.name: AntMiner S9 Low hashrate on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Fan_num.last()}=0) and ({AntMiner S9:icmpping.last()}=1) and ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Elapsed.last()}={AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Elapsed.prev()}) and ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.Elapsed.last()}>0)
trigger.name: Асик завис !!!

trigger.expression: ({AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.URL1.str({$URL1})}=0 or {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.URL2.str({$URL2})}=0 or {AntMiner S9:AntMinerS9.URL3.str({$URL3})}=0) and {AntMiner S9:icmpping.last()}=1
trigger.name: Внимание "левые" URL! {HOST.NAME}
